Detailed Description

Dry versus wet coil decision logic Includes simple anti-windup and limiting of the output to the range 0-1.

Identification: Dry versus wet coil decision logic cclogic.cc

Abstract: Implements logic for selecting results of either wet or dry calculations in the ccsim.cm cooling/dehumidification coil model.

Acceptable input set:

  • TLiq = 10, TSurf = 12, TDp = 18, qDry = 1000, qWet = 1200

Equations:

  • if (qDry < qWet)
  • if (TDp < TLiq)
  • s = 0; use dry
  • else
  • s = 1; use wet
  • else
  • if (TDp < TSurf)
  • s = 0; use dry
  • else
  • s = 1; use wet
